Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy The School of Life Sciences has excellent facilities at the University’s Medical School Campus and also in the adjacent University Park Campus. Our students and researchers have access to some of the best facilities anywhere in the world. Within the School of Life Sciences we provide access to a range of cutting-edge facilities to support research. Our facilities are supported by expert technical staff who can provide training and assistance in areas ranging from advanced microscopy to mechanical design and manufacturing of equipment. Our purpose-designed teaching labs are spacious and foster a natural environment of collaboration. Each can be adapted to smaller or larger groups and is furnished with state-of-the-art, specialist equipment. Away from the laboratory setting, you’ll find our lecture theatres newly refurbished to offer everything you would imagine from one of the world’s very best universities.
